entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 2:12PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...BECOMING WET AND WINDY TONIGHT INTO LATE TUESDAY... Southeast Alaska should ready for periods of heavy rain and wind through mid-week. A strong storm approaches the Panhandle from the south tonight. This storm arrives with strong winds, heavy rainfall, and higher elevation snow late Monday night into Tuesday.
